subject: Re: sloppy code formatting?
body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Kai Blin wrote:
> On Monday 25 June 2007 17:26:31 Gerald (Jerry) Carter wrote:
>> * Trailing whitespace:
>>
>>   $ find . -name "*.[ch]" -exec script/strip_trail_ws.pl {} \;
>>   $ svn diff | wc -l
>>   221187
> 
> Git has an option to automatically strip whitespace on applying patches. You 
> can enable it by adding the following to the .git/config file:
> 
> [apply]
>         whitespace = strip

Thanks.  I figured git would do something like this based on
the lk formatting rules.  Just hadn't found it yet.



cheers, jerry
